Description: On I-664 at mile marker 6.6 in the City of Newport News, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 150 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 123.3 in the County of Spotsylvania, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
